title: Moosh at the MX (2025)
subtitle: Our newest location in the Minster Exchange.

reviews.text: Looking for a great cup of coffee, a quick snack or a place to relax during your work day? Moosh Coffee is here to make it all happen.
reviews.author: Hub8

reviews.text: This is my go-to spot for getting work done. The espresso is genuinely the best in town, and the vibe is perfect for focusing.
reviews.author: Alex P. (via Google Maps)

reviews.text: A hidden gem inside the MX building. Fantastic flat white and the staff are always super friendly. Great for a quiet read or meeting.
reviews.author: Emily R. (via Google Maps)
